casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dyquaon Kenner BRAWLEY 370A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2017 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Brawley, Dyquaon Kenner. Elizabeth Leonard Mckay, Special Deputy Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of November 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2017."
